Navigation - Evenly-Sized

Feb 22, 2016 â€¢ Corey Collins

Navigation sized and spaced evenly. Using the list-reset mixin throws this off due to the pseudo element associated with it. This allows the user to add as many items to a navigation menu as desired and always have equal width menu items. This can obviously get hairy with more menu items, so a responsive solution would need to be crafted specific to your menu.

Three Menu Items

  • Nullam porta
  • Morbi
  • Duis a maximus

Four Menu Items

  • Vivamus tincidunt
  • Morbi tristique
  • Fusce ac posuere
  • Aliquam quis

Eight Menu Items

  • Vestibulum
  • Ullamcorper
  • Molestie
  • Massa
  • Vehicula
  • Integer
  • Varius
  • Lectus
